about_the_game:
About This Game

Diliria VR is a psychological horror experience that immerses you in a fog-filled, abandoned town where unsettling secrets lurk beneath the surface. After surviving a car crash, you awaken disoriented in an eerie, desolate town—yet something feels deeply wrong. The crash didn't happen here, and the fog conceals more than just decaying streets and crumbling buildings. As you explore the claustrophobic alleys and unsettling environments, your sense of reality starts to unravel.

With only a cryptic radio signal and scattered clues to guide you, you must navigate the labyrinthine streets, encounter terrifying creatures, and unlock the dark truth behind your past. Each step brings you closer to confronting the painful memories you've buried—especially the truth about your sister's mysterious death.

Key Features:

  • Immersive VR Horror: Feel the tension and dread as you explore the foggy, decaying town in full virtual reality. Experience every unsettling sound, shadow, and moment of isolation like never before.

  • Engaging Storyline: A deeply personal narrative that unfolds through cryptic radio broadcasts, eerie flashbacks, and spine-chilling encounters. Face the truth of your past and the consequences of your actions.

  • Atmospheric World: The town is a character in itself—every street, building, and object reflects the protagonist's fractured psyche. From claustrophobic alleyways to decaying hospitals, every location immerses you deeper into the mystery.

  • Psychological Horror: Diliria VR focuses on slow-burn tension, guilt, and psychological torment, rather than jump scares. The creatures you encounter represent your inner fears and the darkness you try to hide from.

  • Challenging Exploration: Solve puzzles, gather items, and find new paths as you navigate blocked roads and crumbling buildings. The town's layout changes subtly as your journey continues, adding to the feeling of unease and disorientation.

The Truth is Buried in the Fog

Diliria VR is a game about guilt, loss, and facing the consequences of our actions. Will you uncover the truth, or will you remain lost in the fog forever? Venture deep into the mystery, but be prepared for what you may find. The truth is waiting… but it’s not what you expect.

content_descriptors.notes: Diliria VR features themes of psychological horror, including intense fear, violence, and disturbing imagery. There are references to death and loss, and the game deals with themes of guilt and trauma. While the game does not contain explicit sexual content, the atmosphere and story may be unsettling for some players due to the mature psychological themes.

name: Deliria VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2xxx
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: What's real and what's in your head? In Deliria VR, reality and nightmares blend together, making you question everything with psychological twists and creepy surprises.
